en.ERROR_RELOAD:
There was an error while reloading a command (**%s**):
`%s`
en.USER_PERMISSION_NEEDED: Sorry, but you need the `%s` permission to use that command.
en.BOT_PERMISSION_NEEDED: Sorry, but I need the `%s` permission to use that command.

no.ERROR_RELOAD:
Det oppstod en feil under innlasting an en kommando (**%s**):
`%s`
no.USER_PERMISSION_NEEDED: Unnskyld, men du trenger `%s` for å bruke den kommandoen.
no.BOT_PERMISSION_NEEDED: Unnskyld, men jeg trenger `%s` for å bruke den kommandoen.
